# AWS Test Secrets - FAKE VALUES FOR TESTING ONLY
# These match patterns in pkg/rule/rules/aws.yml

# AWS API Key (np.aws.1)
# Pattern: \b((?:A3T[A-Z0-9]|AKIA|AGPA|AIDA|AROA|AIPA|ANPA|ANVA|ASIA)[A-Z0-9]{16})\b
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AKIATESTFAKEKEY12345

# AWS Secret Access Key (np.aws.2)
# Pattern: aws_?secret_?access_?key with 40 char value
aws_secret_access_key=wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYTESTFAKEKY

# Another API Key format
export AWS_API_KEY="ASIATESTFAKEKEY67890"

# AWS Account ID (np.aws.3)
aws_account_id="123456789012"

# Combined credentials example
[default]
aws_access_key_id = AKIATESTFAKEKEY99999
aws_secret_access_key = 0123456789abcdefghijABCDEFGHIJ0123456789
